properties.name: Houston
properties.message: Houston is the most populous city in Texas and the fourth most populous city in the United States.

properties.name: San Antonio
properties.message: San Antonio is known for the Alamo and its rich colonial heritage.

properties.name: Dallas
properties.message: Dallas is a modern metropolis in north Texas and a commercial and cultural hub of the region.

properties.name: Austin
properties.message: Austin is the state capital of Texas and known for its vibrant live music scene.

properties.name: Fort Worth
properties.message: Fort Worth is known for its well-preserved Western heritage and vibrant cultural scene.
